Category:The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny

nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Dooku's Secret Army
Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Dooku's Secret Army is a young readers' Decide Your Destiny book, released on January 28, 2010.

Join the characters in Star Wars: The Clone Wars on your very own adventure! Jump in and out of cyberspace to continue the experience online with exclusive content, amazing animated scenes and games! There's a new adventure with every read. Rumor has it that Count Dooku is building a highly-trained army to destroy the Jedi! Apprenticed to Jedi Master Plo Koon, you are assigned a mission to locate and destroy the training ground of Dooku's secret army. Your search will take you to different planets and introduce you to many interesting characters – but who should you trust? And can you complete your mission before you are betrayed? Begin your adventures here: www.starwars.com/decideyourdestiny
This is a gallery of different cover variations of The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Dooku's Secret Army.
